channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Extra large pot holes, 16th February
item.description:
Each side of the ford. Extra large very dangerous pot holes. Need the road either side of the fir concreting to stop them returning.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several potholes in Yarnolds making it very difficult to drive around them, 16th February
item.description:
From the beginning of the road to more than half way along. Cars parked on the road means you can't avoid driving over them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 36, Yarnolds, Shurdington, Cheltenham

item.title: Street lamp is out, 16th February
item.description:
Street lamp between nos 9 and 7
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Nettleton Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Three street lights out in one area, 16th February
item.description:
At the roundabout between Selkirk close and All Saints Road. There are three street lights out all in the same place so it is impossible to see where you are walking. Especially dangerous due to the uneven pavements and large trees. It has been like this for a number of weeks now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1-6, Selkirk Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to the verges, 16th February
item.description:
The roadworks here have meant lorries and busses have had to mount the verge causing a lot of damage over a reasonable length. Will this now be repaired?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Previous patchwork repair fix failed!, 16th February
item.description:
The continuation of patchwork repair ‘fixes’ have failed. Numerous potholes in an ever-growing failing ‘repair’ attempts!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham

Outside Windrush.This has been an issue since the road was resurfaced.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury

item.title: Pothole, 16th February
item.description:
Outside 163 Hewlett Rd. Pothole was repaired last week but failed within 2 days. Yet another visit is required due to incompetent and negligence work.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169, Hewlett Road, Fairview, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous series of potholes, 16th February
item.description:
Unavoidable (without swerving into oncoming traffic) series of large, sharp edged potholes. Looked like they had damaged a car earlier today, as an AA van was tending to a car's wheels just after the holes
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes causing drivers to swerve, 16th February
item.description:
Potholes on the mini roundabout by Naunton Park Primary are causing drivers to swerve. Very dangerous situation, especially at drop off/collection times when the area is very busy with primary-age children
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Churchill Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
